Operation 'groupsSettings.groups.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description is too generic ('Gets one resource by id'). Missing summary entirely. Added domain context by specifying this retrieves 'group settings and permission levels', clarified the return value as 'Groups resource object', and made it clear this is a retrieval operation for AI agents to understand when to use this endpoint.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete group settings and permission levels for a specific group identified by its unique ID. Returns the full Groups resource object containing all configuration and permission data for the group.
data.reasoning: Original description is too generic ('Gets one resource by id'). Missing summary entirely. Added domain context by specifying this retrieves 'group settings and permission levels', clarified the return value as 'Groups resource object', and made it clear this is a retrieval operation for AI agents to understand when to use this endpoint.

message: Operation 'groupsSettings.groups.patch' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary and vague description. Original description doesn't explain what resource is being updated or what patch semantics means in this context. Added domain specificity ('group settings and permission levels'), clarified partial update behavior, specified required inputs (groupUniqueId and Groups object), and explained the return value for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Updates an existing resource. This method supports patch semantics.
data.description_suggestion: Performs a partial update of group settings and permission levels using patch semantics. Only the provided fields in the request body will be modified; omitted fields remain unchanged. Requires the group's unique ID and a Groups resource object with the fields to update. Returns the updated Groups resource with all current settings.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and vague description. Original description doesn't explain what resource is being updated or what patch semantics means in this context. Added domain specificity ('group settings and permission levels'), clarified partial update behavior, specified required inputs (groupUniqueId and Groups object), and explained the return value for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'groupsSettings.groups.update' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary and overly generic description. Doesn't clarify that this is a full replacement (PUT semantics) versus partial update, doesn't specify domain context, and lacks input/output details. Added distinction from PATCH operation, clarified this is a complete replacement operation, specified required inputs, and explained the return value to help AI agents distinguish between PATCH and PUT operations.

data.description_suggestion: Performs a complete replacement of group settings and permission levels for a specific group. Requires the group's unique ID and a complete Groups resource object. All fields in the provided object will replace the existing group configuration. Returns the updated Groups resource reflecting all changes.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and overly generic description.
